Name: Model of a Boat with Rowers
Description: This model of a boat has a crew of 10 rowers. The boat is painted red while the crew members are painted dark brown with black hair and white kilts. The clearest features of their faces are the eyes and eyebrows, which are made up in black. Their posture shows that they are not rowing but resting. We can see small holes in their hands where the missing oars were fixed. At the front of the boat is a mast without a sail and the left side of the boat is damaged.
